title: Polityki prywatności
subtitle: Polityka prywatności tłumaczy jak zbieramy i zabezpieczamy Twoje dane. Używając naszej aplikacji zgadzas się na warunki opisane w tej polityce.
cookies-reset-info: Użyj guzika poniżej żeby zresetować swój wybór i wybrać ponownie.
cookies-undefined: You haven't accepted nor rejected the cookies. You can use the banner to pick your choice. You won't see change here unless you refresh this page.
info-content: Our website uses Google Analytics, a service that helps us analyze how users interact with our site. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information, such as how often users visit our site, what pages they visit, and what other sites they used prior to coming to our site. We use this information to improve our website and services. For more information on how Google Analytics collects and processes data, please visit <0>Google's Privacy & Terms.</0>
changes-content: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice. Please review this page periodically to stay informed of any changes.
contact-content: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@example.com.
